title: Theres A New Way To Shop For An Engagement Ring Experience The Ease Of Personalized Luxury At Dr House Of Diamonds
content: **There’s a New Way to Shop for an Engagement Ring. Experience the Ease of Personalized Luxury at D&R House of Diamonds** Print Congratulations! You’ve found your one-and-only, the person with whom you’ll spend the rest of your life. Now comes one of the most monumental occasions of your life: finding your perfect match, the perfect engagement ring. Too bad traditional ring shopping is a hassle. Finding a gorgeous ring that’s both unique and doesn’t break the bank—that’s what the modern diamond experience should be. That’sD&R House of Diamonds. D&R House of Diamonds provides clients a private, personalized experience in a lush, comfortable environment where you watch your engagement ring take shape in real time. This one-to-one consultation is relaxed, educational and never sales-y. Instead, the D&R team is dedicated to helping you pick and design the best ring for your future bride without any obligation or pressure to buy. The fact that the entire process is simple and straightforward is just icing on the wedding cake. Without the expenses of a traditional retail store, D&R House of Diamonds can offer a concierge-like service at an approachable cost. In truth, founders Dave Padgett and Richard Shaw prefer it that way. One-on-one service allows these experts and their 65-years of combined experience to guide you in selecting the right design, gem and metal while passing the savings in overhead on to you. Here’s how designing your engagement ring with D&R works. Shop onlineto find your inspiration and then go straight tobooking a private appointment. Then, visit D&R House of Diamonds’ plush offices in downtown Summerlin where one of D&R’s owners or senior diamond associates is your helpful guide as you choose the perfect loose diamond from D&R House of Diamond’s vast selection ofvintage and modern styles. Want to shop with your fiancée? Bring her along! Many couples shop at D&R together. But for those wanting the element of surprise, all you have to do is supply the dream and let the D&R team take care of the heavy lifting. Remember, there’s no obligation. Part of picking the perfect diamond and designing the best ring is trust. The sole goal of D&R House of Diamonds is to not only help you find a stunning lab grown or mined diamond for your radiant bride-to-be, but to make you and your growing family clients for life. “I thought we’d found our engagement ring designer, but no, we found our family jeweler,” recalls Evelyn Cortez. “My wonderful fiancé designed my engagement ring with Dave. After the proposal, he raved about how wonderfully delightful Dave and the team were and how they facilitated everything, making what would’ve been such a nerve-wracking moment, so easy.” Another recent customer, Guelsy Lemus, agrees. “D&R works by appointment only and I loved it. It feels very personalized and there’s plenty of time to ask any questions. On the first appointment, Rich explained everything we needed to know, and helped me get the design I wanted while staying under budget. I couldn’t have asked for better service. And the rings… I’m in love!! They are so beautiful I can’t stop looking at them!” With hundreds offive-star reviewsand glowing testimonials, it’s no surprise D&R House of Diamonds has been voted Best of Las Vegas six years running. They are also considered a leader in the country for lab grown diamonds. “We’ve worked with Dave since shopping for an engagement ring back in 2017,” recalls Stacey B. “I cannot say enough positive things about Dave, he is truly someone of integrity and truly a joy to work with.” D&R is your private jeweler making luxury simple and affordable. Schedule a free, no-obligationconsultationwith one of the diamond experts at D&R and experience for yourself how easy finding the perfect ring can be.
